timeline.activity: Collect proposed changes to reference data from stakeholders.
timeline.considerations: Launch collection form or CSV templates; log all metadata; track early trends in requests.

timeline.activity: Group similar submissions, flag duplicates, and categorize requests.
timeline.considerations: Align with high-impact policy areas; assess volume per category (e.g., training routes, disability).

timeline.activity: Assess system-level impact and business logic implications.
timeline.considerations: Check cross-references, model risks, dependencies, and data structure integrity.

timeline.activity: Present internal review outcomes to governance and align on decisions.
timeline.considerations: Score requests; include RAG status; log comments and reviewer decisions.

timeline.activity: Notify submitters of outcomes, gather refinements.
timeline.considerations: Email confirmation, status updates; allow feedback on review outcomes and summaries.

timeline.activity: Prepare final version of the data for publication and approval.
timeline.considerations: Normalize value formats, apply version control, and define tags (New, Updated, Removed).

timeline.activity: Approve the entire dataset for implementation.
timeline.considerations: Double-check audit trail and decision rationale; sign-off logged in audit logs.

timeline.activity: Deploy approved reference data into the live system.
timeline.considerations: Validate production environment, schema validation, and UI rendering.

timeline.activity: Final check to confirm the correct visibility and accuracy.
timeline.considerations: Include data tagging and rendering checks (inactive tags, filters, academic year views).

timeline.activity: Reference data becomes available across all channels (UI, API, CSV).
timeline.considerations: Monitor for anomalies; track API usage and CSV downloads.

timeline.activity: Review process success and data quality.
timeline.considerations: Log feedback; analyze rejected values; capture lessons learned for next year.
